content.question: Let h be the depth, in feet, of oil in the tank. How fast was the depth of oil in the tank increasing when <math> <mrow> <mi> h </mi> <mo> = </mo> <mn> 4 </mn> </mrow> </math> ? Indicate all units of measure.

frqParts.text: Let h be the depth, in feet, of oil in the tank. How fast was the depth of oil in the tank increasing when <math> <mrow> <mi> h </mi> <mo> = </mo> <mn> 4 </mn> </mrow> </math> ? Indicate all units of measure.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
